sentences.sCn: 突然，你手表上的可视电话响了。

sentences.sContent: The only time they'd fire up the videophone was whena Klingon was sitting in a spaceship 20 yards away with guns pointed atthem.
sentences.sContent_eng: The only time they'd fire up the videophone was whena Klingon was sitting in a spaceship 20 yards away with guns pointed atthem.
sentences.sCn: 只有当克林贡人坐在20码开外的飞船中，被人用枪指着头的时候，他们才会用视频电话。

trans.tranOther: a type of telephone that allows you to see the person you are talking to on a screen
